synopsis.text:
Negiâ€™s magical journey begins as a 10-year-old prodigy from Wales, freshly graduated from the Magic Academy, and now tasked with teaching English at Mahora Academy in Japan. To become a full-fledged mage, Negi must navigate the challenges of being an educator while keeping his magical abilities a secret. But when his students start discovering his hidden powers, they form partnerships to help Negi on his quest to find his missing father and uncover the truth behind the mysterious Star Crystal.

As Negi and his class face dark forces threatening their school, the group of magical girls must band together to protect their campus and unravel the mysteries surrounding the powerful artifact. With temptations and trials at every turn, Negi and his partners embark on a thrilling adventure filled with magic, friendship, and self-discovery. Will Negi be able to balance his teaching duties, master his magical skills, and save the day with the help of his enchanting allies? Join Negi and his class in this enchanting tale of growth, courage, and determination.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
